name: Parasite (itch) (david-toranzo, Shotgun Entertainment, Tleprie, kevinkerrmusic)
description:
Entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, it fits the theme (Joined Together) because you're fate is tied to both the host and the queen parasite.

In Parasite, you play as a spore. Collect food and bring it to the queen, but don't touch the host's organs. If they die, you die. To win, bring enough food to the queen for her to overpower the host.
